full_summary:
# Interior and Exterior Cleaning Services: WPG01 and WPG02

## Details

### Tender Reference Number
 cb-5569-75061784

### Updated Solicitation Number
 23-58016

### Posting Date
 2023-05-18

### Closing Date
 2023-06-28T14:00:00

### Contract Period

* Anticipated Start Date: 2023-10-02
* Expected End Date: 2024-09-30

## Category and Procurement Details

### Category

* SRV

### Method

* Competitive - Open bidding

## Notice Information

### Status

* Expired

### Trade Agreements

The Government of Canada intends to use the setting aside of certain contracts for certain public policies and agreements. This tender is covered under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Location

### Region of Opportunity
 Winnipeg

### Delivery Region

## Contracting Entity

### Name
 National Research Council Canada

### Address
 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6, Canada

## Contact Point

### Name
 Stéphane  Lajoie

### Email
 [stephane.lajoie@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:stephane.lajoie@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca)

### Phone
 (514) 496-6108

## Description of the Work

The tender requires the provision of interior and exterior cleaning services for the Winnipeg NRC Complex, comprising WPG01 (435 Ellice Avenue) and WPG02 (445 Ellice Avenue). The contract will cover all aspects of cleaning services for the entire complex, including interior and exterior cleaning work.
